bio:
Hongdan Yang is a Research Assistant in Biology at NYU Shanghai. Prior to joining NYU Shanghai, she was a postgraduate in Biology at East China Normal University. She holds a M.A. from East China Normal University.

Research Interests:

Mitosis and Meiosis

Education:

  • M.A. Biology, East China Normal University, 2016
  • B.A. Biology, Qufu Normal University, 2013
